item.title: Hedge always overhanging pavement and broken pillar, 21st September
item.description:
The hedge is permanently overhanging at least a paving slab width of the pathway making navigation of the pavement awkward for wheelchairs and strollers especially while trying to avoid fox or dog poops. The hedge dominates the pavement and the crumbling broken pillar spilling onto the pavement is a trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downs Avenue, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncollected organic waste bags attracting rubbish, 21st September
item.description:
